actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide that the interest rates payable for loans made under such Act for essential community facilities for providing firefighting, emergency transportation, or rescue services may not exceed 5 percent per annum.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to limit interest rates to a maximum of five percent on essential community facilities loans for firefighting, emergency transportation, or rescue services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide that the interest rates payable for loans made under such Act for essential community facilities for providing firefighting, emergency transportation, or rescue services may not exceed 5 percent per annum.
